body_text:
Can you explain the choice of name ignoreSession? I don't think I get it.
It might also be good to have a comment above the routes explaining the extra keys we are adding. They all make sense now, but they aren't documented anywhere, and the schema is pretty important.
body:
Can you explain the choice of name `ignoreSession`? I don't think I get it.

It might also be good to have a comment above the routes explaining the extra keys we are adding. They all make sense now, but they aren't documented anywhere, and the schema is pretty important.
